job.title: Web Developer
job.description: ltpgtThe ideal candidate is a creative problem solver who will work in coordination with crossfunctional teams to design develop and maintain our next generation websites and web tools You must be comfortable working as part of a team while taking the initiative to take lead on new innovations and projectsampnbspltpgtltpgtampnbspltpgtltstronggtResponsibilitiesltstronggtltulgtltligtRevise edit proofread ampamp optimize web content ltligtltligtWork with crossfunctionally to enhance overall user experience of our platforms ltligtltligtOwn various design tasks involved in the web development life cycle from start to finishltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtQualificationsltstronggtltpgtltpgtltulgtltligtBachelors degree or equivalent experience in Computer Science ltligtltligtAt least 1  2 years of experience using HTML CSS and JavaScript ltligtltligtProficiency in at least one serverside technology Java PHP NodeJS Python Ruby ltligtltligtAbility to multitask organize and prioritize workltligtltulgtltpgt
